HEADLINE: Transcript of Analyst Meet held on 11th November, 2022 on Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) for the quarter / period ended 30th September, 2022.

In continuation of our letter dated 4th June, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the transcript of the presentation made on 4th June, 2022, on Audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter / year ended March 31, 2022, is available on the Company's website at: https://finolex.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Transcript-Finolex-Cables-Ltd-Earnings-call-Jun042022.pdf
